Name: Amazonas
Description: A region located in the southeastern part of Colombia, known for its rich biodiversity and the Amazon rainforest.

Name: Antioquia
Description: A major region in the northwest, known for its coffee production, beautiful landscapes, and the city of Medellín.

Name: Atlantico
Description: A coastal region on the Caribbean, known for its beaches, culture, and the city of Barranquilla.

Name: Bogotá D.C.
Description: The capital district of Colombia, located at the heart of the country, known for its historical and cultural landmarks.

Name: Bolivar
Description: A region located along Colombia s Caribbean coast, known for its historical city of Cartagena and beautiful coastal landscapes.

Name: Boyaca
Description: A region located in the Andean highlands, known for its colonial towns, rich history, and the Boyacá Bridge.

Name: Caldas
Description: Located in the coffee-growing region of Colombia, known for its lush landscapes and the city of Manizales.

Name: Caqueta
Description: A region in the southern part of Colombia, known for its Amazonian landscapes and diverse ecosystems.

Name: Casanare
Description: A region located in the eastern plains, known for its agricultural activities and natural resources.

Name: Cauca
Description: Located in the southwestern part of Colombia, known for its mountainous terrain, indigenous cultures, and the city of Popayán.

Name: Cesar
Description: A region located in the northern part of Colombia, known for its agriculture and mining industry.

Name: Choco
Description: Located in the Pacific coastal region, known for its biodiversity, rainforests, and Afro-Colombian culture.

Name: Cordoba
Description: A region located in the north, known for its beaches, mountains, and the city of Montería.

Name: Guainia
Description: A remote region located in the eastern part of Colombia, known for its rivers and part of the Amazon rainforest.

Name: Guaviare
Description: A region known for its rivers, jungle landscapes, and diverse wildlife.

Name: Huila
Description: Located in the southern part of Colombia, known for its coffee production and the San Agustín archaeological park.

Name: La Guajira
Description: A coastal region known for its desert landscapes, indigenous Wayuu culture, and the city of Riohacha.

Name: Magdalena
Description: A region on the Caribbean coast, known for its beautiful beaches and the city of Santa Marta.

Name: Meta
Description: A region located in the eastern plains of Colombia, known for its vast agricultural fields and natural beauty.

Name: Narino
Description: Located in the southwestern part of Colombia, known for its mountainous terrain, coffee plantations, and indigenous cultures.

Name: Norte de Santander
Description: A border region with Venezuela, known for its mountains, cultural diversity, and the city of Cúcuta.

Name: Putumayo
Description: Located in the southern part of Colombia, known for its rainforest, rivers, and indigenous cultures.

Name: Quindío
Description: A region in the coffee-growing area of Colombia, famous for its picturesque towns, coffee farms, and cultural heritage.

Name: Risaralda
Description: A region in the coffee zone of Colombia, known for its beautiful landscape and the city of Pereira.

Name: San Andrés y Providencia
Description: An archipelago in the Caribbean, known for its white-sand beaches, coral reefs, and vibrant cultural heritage.

Name: Santander
Description: A region known for its rugged mountains, the Chicamocha Canyon, and the cities of Bucaramanga and San Gil.

Name: Sucre
Description: Located on the Caribbean coast, known for its beaches, colonial architecture, and the city of Sincelejo.

Name: Tolima
Description: A region located in the central part of Colombia, known for its agricultural products and the city of Ibagué.

Name: Valle del Cauca
Description: A region located on the Pacific coast, known for its agriculture, tourism, and the city of Cali.

Name: Vaupes
Description: A small region located in the Amazon rainforest, known for its indigenous cultures and natural beauty.

Name: Vichada
Description: A region located in the eastern plains, known for its vast tropical forests and wildlife.
